publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5266.1 Murdo Fraser: Learning about Scotland and its History—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5266) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "notes the recent launch of Scotland’s History online and regrets any attempts to promote a nationalist agenda through the use of public resources and the teaching of history."
